criteria: Ability to identify factors influencing food and beverage choices.
Ability to analyze the impact of overconsumption on health.
Ability to model healthy decision-making related to food and beverage consumption.
Application of skills to prevent overconsumption.
descriptions: Does not identify any factors influencing food and beverage choices.
Identifies one factor influencing food and beverage choices with limited accuracy.
Identifies a few factors influencing food and beverage choices with some accuracy.
Identifies several factors influencing food and beverage choices with reasonable accuracy.
Identifies most factors influencing food and beverage choices with good accuracy and some detail.
Identifies all key factors influencing food and beverage choices with excellent accuracy and insightful detail.
Does not demonstrate an understanding of the impact of overconsumption on health.
Demonstrates a limited understanding of the impact of overconsumption on one aspect of health.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of the impact of overconsumption on a few aspects of health.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of the impact of overconsumption on several aspects of health.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of the impact of overconsumption on many aspects of health with supporting details.
Demonstrates a comprehensive and insightful understanding of the impact of overconsumption on health with well-supported arguments.
Does not demonstrate the ability to model healthy decision-making.
Attempts to model healthy decision-making but lacks key components.
Models healthy decision-making with some flaws or omissions.
Models healthy decision-making in a generally effective manner.
Models healthy decision-making effectively, showing consideration of various factors.
Models healthy decision-making exceptionally well, demonstrating a nuanced understanding of the decision-making process and potential outcomes.
Does not apply any skills to prevent overconsumption.
Applies one skill with limited effectiveness.
Applies a couple of skills with some effectiveness.
Applies several skills reasonably effectively to prevent overconsumption.
Applies multiple skills effectively and demonstrates understanding of their impact on preventing overconsumption.
Applies a comprehensive set of skills exceptionally well to prevent overconsumption, demonstrating a deep understanding of preventative strategies.
